instruction:
已知信息：
'在重复给药毒性试验开始前，通常可获得试验剂量对于重复给药毒性试验是否合适的充分信息，该信息可用于确 定进行一项急性遗传毒性试验合适，还是进行一项结合性试 验合适。'可被翻译为：Often sufficient information on the likely suitability of the doses for the repeat-dose toxicology study is available before the study begins and can be used to determine whether an acute or an integrated test will be suitable.
'当进行追加试验以阐明任何遗传毒性指征时，或当采用无体外哺乳动物细胞试验的标准组合选择二时，应对多种因素进行评价以确定高剂量是否适用于遗传毒性评价。'可被翻译为：When carrying out follow-up studies to address any indication of genotoxicity, or when using Option 2 with no in vitro mammalian cell assay, several factors should be evaluated to determine whether the top dose is appropriate for genotoxicity evaluation.
'·稀释样品浓度低于LLOQ；'可被翻译为：• The diluted sample is below the LLOQ
'以上要求同样适用于大量研究样品的分析浓度高于ULOQ的情况。如果可能，应调整校准曲线范围，并增加质控样品或调整浓度。如无法调整校准曲线范围或浓度超过ULOQ的样品数量不多，则应采用经验证的稀释方法对样品进行稀释。'可被翻译为：The same applies if a large number of the analyte concentrations of the study samples are above the ULOQ. The calibration curve range should be changed, if possible, and QC(s) added or their concentrations modified. If it is not possible to change the calibration curve range or the number of samples with a concentration above the ULOQ is not large, samples should be diluted according to the validated dilution method.

根据上述已知信息，请将'为获得合适的毒性范围，在一个较宽的浓度范围内进行初步的范围探索试验是有益的，但是，在遗传毒性试验中，采用剂距非常接近（低于两倍稀释度）的多个浓度进行试验，通常是非常关键的。可对更多、额外的浓度进行试验，但是不必对所有浓度都进行遗传毒性评价。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: To obtain an appropriate toxicity range, a preliminary range-finding assay over a broad range of concentrations is useful, but in the genotoxicity assay it is often critical to use multiple concentrations that are spaced quite closely (less than two fold dilutions). Extra concentrations can be tested but not all concentrations need be evaluated for genotoxicity.

instruction:

'全球数据缺乏种族因素影响相关研究和数据的，应开展必要的PK，和/或PD，有效性和安全性研究，以支持该药品上市申请。'可被翻译为：In the absence of the study and data related to the impact of racial factors in global data, necessary PK, and/or PD, effectiveness and safety studies should be conducted to support the marketing application of the drug.
'对于境外已上市境内未上市的药品，需结合药品具体情况，按照临床评价的基本逻辑对原研药品的临床研究数据进行充分评价，根据评价结果确定临床试验要求。对于不同研发背景的药品，其所需开展的临床试验应具体问题具体分析。'可被翻译为：For the drugs marketed overseas but not marketed in China, full evaluation should be performed for the clinical study data of the originator drugs according to the basic logic of clinical evaluation and in combination with the actual situation of the drugs, and the clinical trial requirements should be determined according to the evaluation results. For drugs with different R & D backgrounds, the clinical trials required to be carried out should be determined case by case.
'（一）治疗严重危及生命且尚无有效治疗手段的疾病的药品，药物临床试验已有数据证实疗效并能预测其临床价值的；'可被翻译为：(1) Drugs used for treating serious life-threatening diseases for which no effective treatment is available, whose efficacy has been verified by data in drug clinical trials and whose clinical values can be predicted;
'第五十九条 药物临床试验期间，用于防治严重危及生命或者严重影响生存质量的疾病，且尚无有效防治手段或者与现有治疗手段相比有足够证据表明具有明显临床优势的创新药或者改良型新药等，申请人可以申请适用突破性治疗药物程序。'可被翻译为：Article 59 During clinical trials, for innovative drugs or modified new drugs used for the prevention and treatment of serious life-threatening diseases or diseases that seriously affect the quality of life but no effective means of prevention and treatment is available, or significantly clinically superior over current treatments with sufficient evidence is demonstrated, the applicant may apply for the breakthrough therapy drug procedure.

根据上述已知信息，请将'对于全球数据中没有中国人群相关数据，但有较充分的种族因素相关研究和分析数据且未见明显种族因素影响的药品，应具体问题具体分析：（1）用于严重或危及生命疾病、罕见病且无有效治疗手段的药品，或用于此类疾病且较现有治疗手段具有明显提高疗效或安全性等优势的药品，可考虑在严格风险控制的前提下批准上市，并应开展上市后有效性和安全性临床试验以支持药品全生命周期获益/风险评估。（2）对于较现有治疗手段未见明显临床优势的药品，应参考“五（一）2”项相关要求进行临床试验。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: For drugs with no relevant data of Chinese population in the global data, but there is relatively sufficient racial factor related study and analysis data and no significant impact of racial factors is identified, the analysis should be conducted on a case-by case basis: (1) For a drug used for serious or life-threatening diseases and rare diseases for which there is no effective therapeutic means, or a drug with significantly improved effectiveness or safety and other advantages over existing therapeutic means when being used for such diseases, the approval for marketing can be considered on the premise of strict risk control, and post-marketing effectiveness and safety clinical trial should be conducted to support the whole life cycle benefit/risk evaluation of the drug. (2) For a drug without significant clinical advantages over existing therapeutic means, the clinical trial should be conducted with reference to the requirements of Section "V (I) 2".

Conformance Optional Data Type Date / Time OID None Value Allowed See Appendix II for further information. nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK Business Rule(s) Minimum precision required is the year (i.e. ‘CCYY’). instruction:
已知信息：
'可以评价各区域间处理效应的一 致性，如果观察到临床相关差异，则应进一步研究并确定这些差异 是否由内在或外在因素差异所致（参见第2.2.7节）。'可被翻译为：Consistency of treatment effects across regions is evaluated, and if clinically relevant differences are observed, there should be further exploration to determine if these differences can be at- tributed to differences in intrinsic or extrinsic factors (see Section 2.2.7).
'分析应该显示临床治疗之间差异 的大小（点估计）、相关的置信区间以及假设检验的结果。'可被翻译为：The analysis should show the size (point estimate) of the difference between the treatments, the associated confidence interval, and where utilised, the results of hypothesis testing.
'不应仅针对完成研究的患者子集评估临床试验的结果， 而且还应对整个随机患者群体进行评估，或至少对所有具有 任意一次研究测量结果的患者进行评估。'可被翻译为：The results of a clinical trial should be assessed not only for the subset of patients who completed the study, but also for the entire patient population as randomised or at least for all those with any on-study measurements.
'对于每隔一段时间重复进行关键疗效变量测量或评估 （例如血液或尿液培养，肺功能测试，心绞痛频率或整体评估）的对照试验，报告附带的数据列表应包括每位试验患者 的识别码，关键变量的所有测量值或观察值（包括基线测量 值），并标注试验期间的测量时间（例如，治疗日和治疗时 间，如相关），该时间点的药物/剂量（如需要，以mg / kg表 示），任何依从性的评估结果、进行测量和评估时或临近时 间内使用的任何伴随用药。'可被翻译为：For a controlled study in which critical efficacy measurements or assessments (e.g., blood or urine cultures, pulmonary function tests, angina frequency, or global evaluations) are repeated at intervals, the data listings accompanying the report should include, for each patient, a patient identifier, all measured or observed values of critical measurements, including baseline measurements, with notation of the time during the study (e.g., days on therapy and time of day, if relevant) when the measurements were made, the drug/dose at the time (if useful, given as mg/kg), any measurements of compliance, and any concomitant medications at the time of, or close to the time of, measurement or assessment.

根据上述已知信息，请将'如果任何疗效或安全性结果的关键测量或评估是由多 方（例如，研究者和专业委员会可提供关于患者是否发生急 性梗塞的意见）合作完成的，应该显示各方评定尺度的整体 差异，并且应识别具有不同评价结果的个体患者。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: If any critical measurements or assessments of efficacy or safety outcomes were made by more than one party (e.g., both the investigator and an expert committee may offer an opinion on whether a patient had an acute infarction), overall differences between the ratings should be shown, and each patient having disparate assessments should be identified.

instruction:

'2018年，在全国医疗器械不良事件监测工作人员的开拓努力下，全国医疗器械不良事件监测工作持续推进，监测范围不断扩大，报告收集能力明显提升，报告数量继续增加。监测人员不良事件分析评价能力不断提高，有效提高了风险的发现和处置能力，生产企业不良事件监测主体责任逐步得到落实，医疗器械不良事件监测工作取得了新的进展︰'可被翻译为：In 2018, with the pioneering efforts of our staff, the national medical device adverse event monitoring has continued to advance, the monitoring scope continued to expand, the report collection capability was significantly improved, and the number of reports saw a persistent increase. The ability of monitoring personnel to analyze and evaluate adverse events has been continuously improved to effectively detect and deal with risks, the principal responsibility of manufacturers' monitoring of adverse events has been gradually implemented, and new progress has been made in this field.
'为全面反映2019年我国医疗器械不良事件监测情况，国家药品不良反应监测中心编撰了《国家医疗器械不良事件监测年度报告（2019年）》。'可被翻译为：To fully reflect the monitoring of adverse events in relation to China's medical devices in 2019, the National Center for Adverse Drug Reaction Monitoring has compiled and released the Annual Report for National Medical Device Adverse Event Monitoring (2019).
'为全面反映2019年我国药品不良反应监测情况，提高安全用药水平，更好地保障公众用药安全，国家药品不良反应监测中心组织编撰《国家药品不良反应监测年度报告（2019年）》。'可被翻译为：To fully reflect the status of China's adverse drug reaction (ADR) monitoring in 2019, improve the level of safe drug use, and better ensure drug safety for the public, the National Center for ADR Monitoring has organized the compilation of the Annual Report for National Adverse Drug Reaction Monitoring (2019)

instruction:

'如果得不到“相关”病毒，或它不太适用于病毒清除的工艺评价研究（如不能离体培养到足够的滴度）， 应使用特异“模型”病毒代替。'可被翻译为：When a “relevant” virus is not available or when it is not well adapted to process evaluation of viral clearance studies (e.g., it cannot be grown in vitro to sufficiently high titers), a specific “model” virus should be used as a substitute.
'如果不能使用已鉴定的病毒，应使用相关模型 病毒或特异模型病毒来评估其工艺清除效果是否可被接受。'可被翻译为：If it is not possible to use the identified virus, “relevant” or specific “model” viruses should be used to demonstrate acceptable clearance.
'在灭活的关键步骤，应对已鉴定的病毒（或相关模型病毒或 特异模型病毒）进行时效性灭活，作为对这些病毒工艺评价 的一部分。'可被翻译为：Time-dependent inactivation for identified (or “relevant” or specific “model”) viruses at the critical inactivation step(s) should be obtained as part of process evaluation for these viruses.
'在选择清除研究用病毒时，首先要明确对已知病毒清除的工艺评价和对用非特异模型病毒（后文叙述）进行的工艺病毒去除验证的评估之间的区别。'可被翻译为：In selecting viruses to use for a clearance study, it is useful to distinguish between the need to evaluate processes for their ability to clear viruses that are known to be present and the desire to estimate the robustness of the process by characterising the clearance of non-specific “model” viruses (described later).

根据上述已知信息，请将'如无法使用该病毒，应使用“相关”和/或特异模型病毒（后文叙述）。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: If it is not possible to use the identified virus, “relevant” and/or specific “model” viruses (described later) should be used.

instruction:
已知信息：
'鼓励申办方探索另外的、新出现的方法来估计不治疗 的作用，例如使用基于药物计量学的方法。'可被翻译为：Sponsors are encouraged to explore alternative and emerging methods for estimating the no-treatment effect (e.g. using pharmacometric-based approaches).
'选择的种属和模型应与正在开发的药物的特定临床适应症相关。'可被翻译为：Species and models selected should be relevant to the specific clinical indication for which the drug is being developed.
'对于血液学恶性肿瘤而言，在许多情况下疾病特定缓解标准往往无法避免，并且某些病种还未实现完全协调。因此，及时跟进国际工作组在这些问题上取得的进展就显得十分重要。特别是，当在新的临床指导原则中引入更为开放的疾病特定缓解标准时，希望申办者能重点对药物开发方面进行解释。'可被翻译为：The use of tumour biomarkers and other dynamic measures of activity is encouraged. In haematological malignancies, disease specific response criteria are unavoidable in many cases and full harmonization has not yet been accomplished for some disease entities. Therefore it is of importance to follow the progress made by international working groups on these issues. Especially if less conservative disease specific response criteria are introduced in new clinical guidelines, a justification with focus on aspects of drug development is expected from the sponsor.
'该附录引入了疾病特异性指导，而且重构了以治疗和相对毒性目 的为基础的验证性研究章节。'可被翻译为：In this appendix disease specific guidance was introduced and the section on confirmatory studies based on aims of therapy and relative toxicity was restructured.

根据上述已知信息，请将'特别是如果在新的临床指导原则中引入了不太保守的疾病特异 性缓解标准时，期望获得申办方的关于药物开发的理由。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Especially if less conservative disease specific response criteria are introduced in new clinical guidelines, a justification with focus on aspects of drug development is expected from the sponsor.

instruction:
已知信息：
'基因嵌入'可被翻译为：gene intercalation
'DNA或RNA的一种突变形式，在多核昔酸链内插入了一个或多个额外核昔酸的过程。（2）在DNA或RNA链中增加一个或多个额外核昔酸的过程。'可被翻译为：A mutated form of DNA or RNA in which one or more additional nucleotides are inserted into a polynucleoxylic acid chain. (2) A process by which one or more additional nucleotides are added to a strand of DNA or RNA.
'抗原与抗体、配体与受体等分子之间的结合是一对一的关系，这种一对一的反应称特异性反应。'可被翻译为：The binding between antigens and antibodies, ligand and receptors and other molecules is a one-to-one relationship, and this one-to-one reaction is called a specific reaction.
'计算被设计的药物分子与受体结合的空间和电性的互补性，修饰并优化药物分子的取代基和分子构象，优化受体与配体间相互作用的过程。'可被翻译为：Calculate the spatial and electrical complementarity of the binding of the designed drug molecule with the receptor, modify and optimize the substitution group and molecular conformation of the drug molecule, and optimize the interaction process between the receptor and ligand.

根据上述已知信息，请将'化学上指在两个分子或基团之间加入一个分子，过程可逆。DNA嵌入时有许多分子可与生物体内的DNA发生交互作用，以配体为例，嵌入是配体分子与DNA的一种结合方式，当配体大小符合碱基对之间的空隙 时，就有可能插入其中，从而造成DNA分 子结构的扭曲变形。通常嵌入DNA的配体 是多环类、芳香类，或是平面分子。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Chemically, the insertion of a molecule between two molecules or groups in a reversible process. When DNA is embedded, many molecules can interact with DNA in living organisms. Take ligand as an example, embedding is a way of binding ligand molecules to DNA. When the size of ligand meets the gap between the base pairs, it is possible to insert it, resulting in the distortion of the DNA substructure. Usually ligands embedded in DNA are polycyclic, aromatic, or planar molecules.

instruction:
已知信息：
'此类差异可 能影响试验结果和/或对试验结果的解释。'可被翻译为：Such differences may have an impact on the trial results and/or their interpretation.
'（1）比较个别研究以更好地理解整体结果（见第III.C.1节，个别研究的结果 的比较）；和'可被翻译为：(1) comparing the individual studies to better understand the overall results (see section III.C.1., Comparison of Results of Individual Studies); and
'在大多数情况下，跨研究汇总的数据的亚群效应的分析比个别研究中的分析更有可能具有足够的功效来评价差异。'可被翻译为：In most cases, analyses of subpopulation effects in data pooled across studies are more likely than analyses in individual studies to have adequate power to assess differences.
'如上所述，综合亚群分析应包括个别研究（在个别研究中的亚群足够大以使其有用）和汇总分析。'可被翻译为：As noted, the integrated subpopulation analyses should include both individual studies (where subpopulations are large enough for this to be useful) and pooled analyses.

根据上述已知信息，请将'个别研究之间的差异可影响汇总分析的有效性和可解释性。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Differences among individual studies can affect the validity and interpretability of pooled analyses.

instruction:
已知信息：
'压缩正常时出现异常CUS，或是，在筛选期间不可压缩，在完全压缩期间血栓直径大幅增加（4毫米或以上）；'可被翻译为：Abnormal CUS where compression had been normal or, if non-compressible during screening, a substantial increase (4 mm or more) in diameter of the thrombus during full compression;
'一些可能有用的成像技术可能不会被常规性地使用（如新引 进的或者已有的影像诊断学）和/或可能难以解读（如幼儿的胸片） 。'可被翻译为：Some potentially useful imaging techniques may not be in routine use (e.g. newly-introduced or experimental diagnostic imaging) and/or may be difficult to interpret (e.g. chest radiographs in young children).
'血栓形成'可被翻译为：Thrombogenicity
'（例如：血栓形成后综合征和慢性血栓栓塞性肺动脉高压）。'可被翻译为：(i.e.: the post-thrombotic syndrome and chronic thromboembolic pulmonary hypertension).

根据上述已知信息，请将'CUS成像可能产生技术上的困难，或异常更多的提示既往血栓而不是最近形成的血栓，这些情况并不少见。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Not infrequently, CUS imaging may be technically difficult, or the abnormality is more suggestive of old rather than recent thrombosis.

output: Human lymphoblasts and mouse lymphoma cells, reproducibly with S9, in some cases without S9;

instruction:
已知信息：
'由肾上腺皮质所分泌的，可以调节体内糖和水盐代谢的类固醇激素。'可被翻译为：A steroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex that regulates the metabolism of sugars and salts in the body.
'调节性腺分泌或对性功能进行干扰类药物的总称。如雌激素、雄激素、孕激素等。'可被翻译为：A general term for drugs that regulate gonadal secretion or interfere with sexual function. Such as estrogen, androgen, progesterone, etc.
'由活细胞合成的、对其特异底物起高效催化作用的蛋白质或结合蛋白。'可被翻译为：A protein or binding protein synthesized by living cells that acts as an efficient catalyst for their specific substrates.
'一般为肽类，能增强或减弱神经元对神经递质反应，起调节作用。'可被翻译为：Usually peptides, which can enhance or weaken the response of neurons to neurotransmitters and play a regulatory role.

根据上述已知信息，请将'由内分泌腺或内分泌细胞分泌的高效生物活性物质。在体内作为信使传递信息，对机体生理过程起调节作用。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: A highly bioactive substance secreted by endocrine glands or endocrine cells. It acts as a messenger in the body to carry information and regulate physiological processes.

instruction:
已知信息：
'主要分析应使用由中心实验室进行的血清学研究的结果。'可被翻译为：The results of serology performed at centralised laboratories should be used in the primary analysis.
'其他检测应该在中心实验室完成。'可被翻译为：Other assessments should be done in central laboratories.
'临床研究中，建议由配备适当的专业人员的中心实验室对从认可的当地实验室获 得的鉴定和药敏试验结果进行确认， 独立分型以区别于新感染的复发， 并进行血清学研究。'可被翻译为：During clinical studies it is recommended that the confirmation of identification and susceptibility test results obtained from accredited local laboratories, isolate typing to distinguish relapses from new infections and serological studies should be conducted at designated centralised laboratories with appropriate expertise.
'最好是临床开发项目中的所有研究都通过指定中心实验室对分离株鉴定和药敏试验的结果进行再确认。'可被翻译为：It is preferable that all studies in the clinical development programme should employ re-confirmation of isolate identity and susceptibility testing at designated central laboratories.

根据上述已知信息，请将'应该主要由有相应专长的中心实验室进行血清学研究或确认结果。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Central laboratories with appropriate expertise should be used for the primary conduct of serological studies or for the confirmation of results.

instruction:
已知信息：
'目前实际的诊断方法是在出现痴呆症状之前，需要具有至少一年以上的帕金森病主要运动症状。'可被翻译为：A current pragmatic approach requires at least one year of major parkinsonian motor symptoms before the onset of dementia symptoms appears.
'对于症状治疗，可能需要至少 12 个月的长期有效性研究，因为症状随时间的变化可能较为缓慢。'可被翻译为：Longer efficacy studies of at least 12 months for symptomatic treatments might be needed since changes of symptoms over time evolve more slowly.
'提示预后不良的因素为症状出现时年龄较大、从初次出现症状到作出诊断的时间短、延髓 起病及呼吸功能恶化。'可被翻译为：Prognostically unfavourable factors are older age at time of onset of symptoms, short time from first symptoms to diagnosis, bulbar onset and worsening respiratory function.
'已鉴定出数个候选的蛋白水平、神经生理学和神经影像学ALS生物标志物，但到 目前为止仍没有一个可经充分验证来用作临床结局的诊断或替代参数（Turner 2009; Bowser 2011）。'可被翻译为：Several candidate protein-based, neurophysiological and neuroimaging biomarkers for ALS have been identified but until now none has been sufficiently validated for use as a diagnostic or surrogate parameter for clinical outcome (Turner 2009; Bowser 2011).

根据上述已知信息，请将'其症状往往要到出现明显的运动功能丧失时才会被辨认出，并且从发病到确诊之 间的平均诊断延迟时间仍有约1年（Mitchell 2010; Bowser 2011）。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Symptoms are often not recognised until considerable motor function has been lost and the mean delay from presentation to diagnosis is approximately 1 year (Mitchell 2010; Bowser 2011).

instruction:
已知信息：
'第二十四条 核查组应当由2名以上具备药品检查员资格的人员组成，实行组长负责制。根据核查品种的具体情况，可有相关领域专家参与注册核查。对药品审评中心启动的有因检查，药品审评中心原则上应当派员参加。'可被翻译为：Article 24 The inspection team shall be composed of two or more persons who are qualified as drug inspectors, and the team leader shall assume overall responsibility. According to the specific conditions of the inspected varieties, experts in related fields may participate in the registration inspection. The CDE shall, in principle, send personnel to participate in cause-related inspections initiated by it.
'核查中心和省级局可分别组建检查组， 或共同组建一个检查组。原则上注册核查与上市前 GMP 检查选择在同一生产周期内开展。'可被翻译为：The CFDI and the provincial authority may form separate inspection teams or jointly form an inspection team. In principle, the registration inspection, and the Pre-market GMP inspection should be carried out in the same production period.
'第六条 根据法规要求和职能， 核查中心和省级局按程序组建检查组，完成药品注册现场核查和上市前 GMP 检查工作。'可被翻译为：Article 6 In accordance with the requirements and functions of laws and regulations, the CFDI and provincial authorities shall form inspection team in accordance with procedures to complete the drug registration inspection and Pre-market GMP inspection.
'第三条 核查中心协调省级局同步实施检查工作时，双方应当根据法规要求和各自职能，遵循风险管理的理念，共同合作，保证注册核查与上市前GMP 检查的有机衔接。'可被翻译为：Article 3 When the CFDI coordinates the collaborative inspections with provincial authorities, both parties shall, in accordance with the regulatory requirements and their respective functions, follow the concept of risk management and work together to ensure the smooth collaboration between registration inspection and Pre-market GMP inspection.

根据上述已知信息，请将'如共同组建检查组，检查组长和组员均应为国家药品GMP 检查员。检查组长由核查中心和省级局共同协商确定。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: If an inspection team is formed together, the inspection team leader and team members should be qualified national GMP inspectors. The inspection team leader shall be determined by the CFDI and the provincial authority through joint discussion.

instruction:
已知信息：
'是否属于重要风 险将取决于多个因素，包括对个人的影响、风险的严 重性以及对公众健康的影响。'可被翻译为：What constitutes an important risk will depend upon several factors, including the impact on the individual, the seriousness of the risk, and the impact on public health.
'关于风险，请考虑其临床重要性，例如毒性的性质、严重性、频率、 可预测性、可预防性、可逆性、对患者的影响、以及它是否源于标签 外使用、新用途或误用。'可被翻译为：With respect to risk, consider its clinical importance, e.g., nature of toxicity, seriousness, frequency, predictability, preventability, reversibility, impact on patients, and whether it arose from off-label use, a new use, or misuse.
'在评估个体风险的公众健康影响时，MAH应考虑 以下要点（其目的只是说明而不是综合性的）：产品使用的程度（治疗人群的大小），频率和健康后果（包括严重性、可预防性和可逆性的考虑）。'可被翻译为：In assessing the public health impact of individual risks, the MAH should consider the following points that are intended to be illustrative rather than comprehensive: extent of product use (size of treated population), frequency, and health consequences (including consideration of seriousness, preventability, and reversibility).
'可能会影响产品的风险-利益特征或对公众健康产生影响的已确定风险或潜在风险。是否属于重要风险将取决于多个因素，包括对个人的影响、风险的严重性以及对公众健康的影响。通常，有可能被纳入产品标签中的禁忌，警告和注意事项章节的任何风险都应该被认为是重要的风险。'可被翻译为：An identified risk or potential risk that could impact on the risk-benefit profile of the product or have implications for public health. What constitutes an important risk will depend upon several factors, including the impact on the individual, the seriousness of the risk, and the impact on public health. Normally, any risk that is likely to be included in the contraindications or warnings and precautions section of the product labelling should be considered important.

根据上述已知信息，请将'在确定风险是否重要时应考虑以下因素： 风险的医学严重性，包括对个体患者的影响； 其频率、可预测性、可预防性和可逆性； 对公众健康的潜在影响（频率，治疗人群的大小）；和 由于公众对风险的认识，避免使用具有预防作用的医疗产品的可能性。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: The following factors should be considered when determining whether or not a risk is important: Medical seriousness of the risk, including the impact on individual patients; Its frequency, predictability, preventability, and reversibility; Potential impact on public health (frequency; size of treated population); and Potential for avoidance of a medical product with a preventive benefit as a result of public perception of risk.

instruction:
已知信息：
'这样才能评估抗体发生的临床意义，以及抗体效应是否随时间变化，这种变化可能是因为滴度变化和/或抗体反应的同种型变化/亲和性成熟导致的。'可被翻译为：This allows assessment of the clinical significance of antibody development, and also whether the antibody effect changes over time, which could occur as a result of increase in titre and/or isotype switching/affinity maturation of the antibody response.
'在这种情况下，要考虑更广泛地监 测与治疗结果有关的抗-单抗反应动力学。'可被翻译为：In such cases, more extensive monitoring of the anti-mAb response dynamics relative to therapeutic outcome may have to be considered.
'这适用于抗体测定和表征所采用的测定法以及评价对抗体的临床应答（如果诱导出临床应答）所采用的方法。'可被翻译为：This applies to assays used to measure and characterise antibodies and to methods employed for assessing clinical responses to antibodies if they are induced.
'8.1. 抽样计划的依据和抗体应答的动力学'可被翻译为：8.1. Rationale for sampling schedule and kinetics of the antibody response

根据上述已知信息，请将'抗体生成和持续时间的动力学以及抗体应答程度的评价较为重要，因为这与临床后果相关。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Evaluation of the kinetics of antibody development and the duration as well as the magnitude of the antibody response is important as it may correlate with clinical consequences.

instruction:
已知信息：
'在下文中讨论在不同类别的长持续时间疼痛中的合适的疼痛模型示例。'可被翻译为：Examples for suitable pain models in the different categories of pain of long duration are discussed in the following.
'为了证明治疗急性疼痛的一般适应症是合理的，需要在躯体和内脏疼痛模型中或在躯体疼痛和躯体/内脏混合疼痛模型中独立证明有效性。'可被翻译为：To justify a general indication for the treatment of acute pain, efficacy needs to be demonstrated independently in models of both somatic and visceral pain, or in models of somatic pain and mixed somatic/visceral pain.
'在急性疼痛试验中，研究持续时间可以从几小时到几周不等，取决于所研究的疼痛模型或临床情况。'可被翻译为：Study duration may vary from hours to weeks in acute pain trials, depending on the pain model or clinical situation being studied.
'在突破性疼痛的情况下，来自更普遍疼痛模型的临床数据将适合于此目的。'可被翻译为：In the case of breakthrough pain clinical data from more general pain models will be appropriate for this purpose.

instruction:
已知信息：
'在小规模人群、非常罕见的肿瘤的研究 对于一些真正罕见的肿瘤或者非常窄的适应症（究竟是由于肿瘤表型还是由于与靶 点表达有关的限制所致），为了检测抗肿瘤活性的明显相关性差异根本不可能招募到足 够数量的患者进行合理效力的随机研究。'可被翻译为：Studies in small study populations, very rare tumours For some truly rare tumours or very narrow indications, whether due to tumour phenotype or restrictions related to target expression, it is simply not possible to recruit a sufficiently large number of patients to conduct reasonably powered, randomised studies in order to detect clearly relevant differences in anti-tumour activity.
'如果探索性研究基于肿瘤表型/基因型为纳入/排除特定的患者提供基础，那么这将 在说明书中显示出来。作为一种推论，如果患有未表现活性靶向的肿瘤的患者符合资格，那么若其未通过亚组分析等证明目标表现与抗肿瘤活性无关，那么受限说明书仍适用。'可被翻译为：If exploratory studies provide a basis for including/excluding certain patients based on tumour phenotype/genotype, this will be reflected in the labelling. As a corollary, if patients with tumours not expressing the target for activity are eligible, a restricted labelling may still be appropriate if it has not been demonstrated, e.g. by subgroup analyses, that target expression is irrelevant for anti-tumour activity.
'与靶抗原结合：应筛选（过）表达靶抗原的肿瘤细胞或血浆，并应研究靶抗原表达 与活性的关系。'可被翻译为：Binding to target antigen(s): tumour cells or plasma should be screened for (over)-expression of the target and the relationship between target expression and activity should be investigated.
'性别 对于一些肿瘤和/或治疗，已经报道了与性别相关的抗肿瘤活性差异。'可被翻译为：Gender For some tumours and/or therapies, a difference in antitumour activity related to gender has been reported.

根据上述已知信息，请将'对于一些罕见肿瘤或非常有限的适应症，无论是由于肿瘤显型还是相关靶基因的表达限制，几乎就不可能招蓦足够大样本量的患者进行更有说服力的试验，为发现明显相关的抗肿瘤方面的差异应进行随机研究。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: For some truly rare tumours or very narrow indications, whether due to tumour phenotype or restrictions related to target expression, it is simply not possible to recruit a sufficiently large number of patients to conduct reasonably powered, randomised studies in order to detect clearly relevant differences in anti-tumour activity.

instruction:
已知信息：
'基于上述这些原因，任何暴露在一个后来被鉴定 为致突变的杂质下的情况，不一定与已暴露于该杂质的患者的患癌风险增加相关。'可被翻译为：Based on all the above considerations, any exposure to an impurity that is later identified as a mutagen is not necessarily associated with an increased cancer risk for patients already exposed to the impurity.
'例如，工艺相关杂质和基 质组分不会对剂量反应曲 线的特征造成显著影响。'可被翻译为：For example, process related and matrix components do not significantly affect the characteristics of the dose response curve
'本指导原则不适用于ICH S9（参考文献4）所定义的拟用于晚期癌症适应症的原料药和制剂。另外，某些情况下拟用于其它适应症的原料药本身在治疗浓度下就存在遗传毒性，且预测可能会增加致癌风险。在这些情况下，暴露于致突变杂质不会显著增加原料药的致癌风险。因此，杂质可以按非致突变性杂质进行控制。'可被翻译为：This guideline does not apply to drug substances and drug products intended for advanced cancer indications as defined in the scope of ICH S9 (Ref. 4). Additionally, there may be some cases where a drug substance intended for other indications is itself genotoxic at therapeutic concentrations and may be expected to be associated with an increased cancer risk. Exposure to a mutagenic impurity in these cases would not significantly add to the cancer risk of the drug substance. Therefore, impurities could be controlled at acceptable levels for non-mutagenic impurities.
'本指导原则不适用于ICH S9（参考文献4）所定义的拟用于晚期癌症适应症的原料药和制剂。另外，某些情况下，拟用于其它适应症的原料药本身在治疗浓度下就存在遗传毒性，且预期可能会增加致癌风险。在这些情况下，暴露于致突变杂质不会显著增加原料药的致癌风险。因此，杂质可以按非致突变性杂质进行控制。 本指导原则所述对杂质潜在致突变性的评估不适用于矫味剂、着色剂和香料，以及已上市药物中使用的辅料。本指导原则不适用于药物包材相关的可浸出物，但如有必要，可使用本指导原则中描述的限制潜在致癌风险的安全风险评估原则。如有必要，首次在药品中使用的化学合成辅料中的杂质，可采用本指导原则的安全风险评估原则。'可被翻译为：This guideline does not apply to drug substances and drug products intended for advanced cancer indications as defined in the scope of ICH S9 (Ref. 4). Additionally, there may be some cases where a drug substance intended for other indications is itself genotoxic at therapeutic concentrations and may be expected to be associated with an increased cancer risk. Exposure to a mutagenic impurity in these cases would not significantly add to the cancer risk of the drug substance. Therefore, impurities could be controlled at acceptable levels for non-mutagenic impurities. Assessment of the mutagenic potential of impurities as described in this guideline is not intended for excipients used in existing marketed products, flavoring agents, colorants, and perfumes. Application of this guideline to leachables associated with drug product packaging is not intended, but the safety risk assessment principles outlined in this guideline for limiting potential carcinogenic risk can be used if warranted. The safety risk assessment principles of this guideline can be used if warranted for impurities in excipients that are used for the first time in a drug product and are chemically synthesized.

根据上述已知信息，请将'在这些情况下，暴露 在致突变杂质下不会显著增加原料药的癌症风险。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Exposure to a mutagenic impurity in these cases would not significantly add to the cancer risk of the drug substance.

instruction:

根据上述已知信息，请将'多数工人能每天暴露而无不良反应的空气中的浓度（即，有效的，安全和危险浓度之间的阈值）。该值由 ACGIH 确立（且每年进行修正），是以每日工作7或8小时，每周工作40小时计算的时间加权浓度（TWA），其与长期影响有关。（IUPAC）'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Threshold Limit Value: The concentration in air to which it is believed that most workers can be exposed daily without an adverse effect (i.e., effectively, the threshold between safe and dangerous concentrations). The values were established (and are revised annually) by the ACGIH and are time_x0002_weighted concentrations (TWA) for a 7- or 8-hour workday and 40-hour workweek, and thus related to chronic effects. instruction:

output: An adverse effect on bone quality can be identified by a change in the correlation between bone mass (i.e., bone mineral density (BMD) or bone mineral content (BMC)) and bone strength.

根据上述已知信息，请将'当所用颜色不与任何一特征有关联，且色彩设计的应用没有格式时，颜色差异化的方法是最有效的。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Color differentiation is most effective when the color used has no  association with a particular feature and there is no pattern in the application of the color scheme.

instruction:
已知信息：
'一些改变只有在适当的停药后时期以使器官系统成熟并表达出改变后才能确定。因此，一些评估只有在达到一定程度的成熟后进行才有意义（例如学习和记忆、免疫功能）。这些评估可以在暴露涵盖与临床使用相关的所有发育窗口之后的停药后时期进行。当JAS给药期在未成熟年龄时停止的情况下，这一点尤为重要，动物将在停药后时期继续成熟至可进行合适评估的年龄。'可被翻译为：Some alterations can only be identified following an appropriate post-treatment period to allow maturation of an organ system and expression of the alteration. Therefore, some assessments can only be meaningfully performed after a certain level of maturity is reached (e.g., learning and memory, immunological function). These assessments can be conducted in post-treatment periods after exposure has covered all developmental windows relevant to the clinical use. This is especially relevant in cases when the JAS dosing duration would cease at an immature age and the animals will continue to mature during the post-treatment period to an age at which an appropriate assessment can be conducted.
'需要对在治疗停止后药品对免疫系统影响的可逆性进行评价。'可被翻译为：Reversibility of the drug-effect on the immune-system after treatment withdrawal needs to be evaluated.
'3.5 停药后时期评估'可被翻译为：3.5 Post-Treatment Period Assessments
'使用TPO 受体激动剂而引发的网硬蛋白增加已被证实，并且在停药后呈现可逆性。'可被翻译为：An increased bone marrow reticulin has been demonstrated with the use of TPO-R agonists and it appears to be reversible when treatment is discontinued.

根据上述已知信息，请将'是否需进行停药后时期评估，取决于WoE评价的结果和试验中所评估的终点指标。ICHM3中的评价潜在的可逆性的原则适用。停药后时期的期限应足以使影响可能恢复，并应考虑到药物的清除。但是，证明完全可逆性并非是必要的。可逆性的趋势（如发生率和/或严重程度降低）以及对最终将达到完全可逆性的科学评估可能足够。同样，如果某一特定影响的不可逆性在成年动物中已充分表征，则通常没有必要在JAS中证实这一点。JAS的一些终点指标不适用于可逆性评估的经典方法，例如青春期开始的时间。此外，应考虑与动物生命阶段相关的停药后时期的时间选择。如果停药后时期开始于成熟之前，可逆性的能力可能受到某些器官系统持续生长和发育的影响，应谨慎解释。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Whether a post-treatment period is advisable is dependent on the outcome of the WoE assessment and the endpoints to be evaluated in the study. The principles of evaluation of the potential for reversibility in ICH M3 apply. The duration of the post-treatment period should be sufficient to allow the potential recovery of the effect and should take into account the elimination of the pharmaceutical. However, the demonstration of full reversibility is not considered essential. A trend towards reversibility (e.g., decreased incidence and/or severity) and a scientific assessment that this would eventually progress to full reversibility could be sufficient. Likewise, if irreversibility of a specific effect is well characterised in adult animals, it is generally not necessary to confirm this in a JAS. There are endpoints in a JAS that are not amenable to the classic approach of reversibility assessment, such as the timing of onset of puberty. Additionally, the timing of the post-treatment period in relation to the life stage of the animals should be considered. If the post-treatment period begins prior to maturity, the capacity for recovery can be influenced by the continued growth and development of some organ systems and should be carefully interpreted.

血栓预防在防止 DVT、近端 DVT、PE 和致命 PE 中得以证明的疗效 
手术相关的 VTE 风险水平分为高-中-低三级，以便在各风险水平进行组特异的 VTE 预防：
VTE高危手术如下肢骨科大手术（如髋关节、膝盖、髋部骨折择期手术）或腹部和癌症大手术（如结肠、子宫、卵巢手术）
VTE 中危手术如良性疾病、创伤或下肢骨折的软组织大手术 
VTE 低危手术如腹部小手术、静脉曲张手术、膝关节镜检查、膝盖韧带重建'可被翻译为：-high prevalence of VTE intra- and post-operatively (without prophylaxis, the incidence of hospital-acquired asymptomatic DVT [assessed by venography] is approximately 40 – 60% following major orthopaedic surgery; up to one third of these thrombi involve the proximal deep veins) 
-the formation of a thrombus in a deep vein predisposes patient to symptomatic DVT and PE (which may be the initial clinical manifestation of a DVT) and fatal PE 
-proven efficacy of thromboprophylaxis at preventing DVT, proximal DVT, PE and fatal PE The risk stratification to three (high-moderate-low)surgery
-relatedVTE risk levels allows for the implementation of group-specific VTE prophylaxis at each risk level: 
-surgery with high VTE risk such as major orthopaedic surgery of the lower limbs (e.g. elective hip or knee surgery, hip fracture) or major abdominal and cancer surgery (e.g. colorectal, uterine, ovarian surgery) 
-surgery with moderate VTE risk such as major soft tissue surgery of benign disease, trauma or fracture of lower extremities 
-surgery with low VTE risk such as minor abdominal surgery, varicose veins surgery, knee arthroscopy, knee ligament reconstruction

'手术患者的静脉血栓栓塞（VTE）的发病率最高。'可被翻译为：Surgical patients have the highest prevalence of venous thromboembolism (VTE).

instruction:
已知信息：
'申办者如果想利用一个相对于标准治疗 药物的非劣效性试验来说明试验药物的有效性，就应如1.5 中所讨论的那样，解决试验检测灵敏度问题。'可被翻译为：A sponsor intending to demonstrate effectiveness by means of a trial showing non- inferiority of the test drug to a standard agent needs to address the issue of the assay sensitivity of the trial, as discussed in section 1.5.
'当活性对照试验是用于说明试验药物的非劣 效性时，那么就应该特别考虑在1.5讨论过的检测灵敏度。'可被翻译为：When an active control trial is used to show efficacy by demonstrating non-inferiority, there is the special consideration of assay sensitivity, which is considered above in section 1.5.
'1.5.1 非劣效/等效性试验的检测灵敏度'可被翻译为：1.5.1 Assay Sensitivity in Non-inferiority or Equivalence Trials
'反之，若试验想要通过显示试 验治疗与活性对照相比的非劣效性来证明其有效性，而缺少 检测灵敏度，则可能会得到一个显示非劣效性的无效治疗， 由此导致错误的有效性结论。'可被翻译为：In contrast, if a trial is intended to demonstrate efficacy by showing a test treatment to be non-inferior to an active control, but lacks assay sensitivity, the trial may find an ineffective treatment to be non-inferior and could lead to an erroneous conclusion of efficacy.

根据上述已知信息，请将'1.5中讨论了非劣效性或等效性试验中检测灵敏度的问 题以及试验对得出有效性结论的能力。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: See section 1.5 for discussion of the problem of assay sensitivity and the ability of the trial to support an efficacy conclusion in non-inferiority or equivalence trials.

instruction:
已知信息：
'必要时，应当采用适当的统计学方法；'可被翻译为：when necessary, statistical approaches should be employed;
'一 般应采用两种性别的动物，如果采用特定的单性别应证明其合理 性。'可被翻译为：Both sexes should generally be used, or justification should be given for specific omissions.
'“显著性”检验（为推理性统计方法）只是被用于帮助解释结果。结果解释本身必须以生物学的合理性为依据。仅仅因为没有“统计学意义”而认为与对照组结果的差别没有生物学意义的推论是轻率的。从某种程度上讲，认为有“统计学意义”的差别一定有生物学意义也是不慎重的。特别是对那些呈偏态分布的低发生率的事件（例如胚胎死亡、畸形），统计学在研究中所占权重很低。相关各变量的可信区间可提示可能的作用大小。应用统计学程序时，应考虑组间比较所采用的指标单位：采用窝而不是胎仔个体为单位，若亲代两种性别动物均给药处理，则用交配对（也即两代研究中亲代的配对）为单位。'可被翻译为："Significance" tests (inferential statistics) can be used only as a support for the interpretation of results. The interpretation itself must be based on biological plausibility. It is unwise to assume that a difference from control values is not biologically relevant simply because it is not "statistically significant". To a lesser extent it can be unwise to assume that a "statistically significant" difference must be biologically relevant. Particularly for low frequency events (e.g. embryonic death, malformations) with one sided distributions, the statistical power of studies is low. Confidence intervals for relevant quantities can indicate the likely size of the effect. When using statistical procedures, experimental units of comparison should be considered: the litter, not the individual conceptus, the mating pair, when both sexes are treated, the mating pair of the parent generation in a two generation study.
'交配时间的准确性应予详细说明，因为它会影响胎仔和幼仔相关参数的变异性。'可被翻译为：The accuracy of the time of mating should be specified since this will affect the variability of fetal and neonatal parameters.

根据上述已知信息，请将'当采用推理性统计方法（判断统计学意义）时，应该以交配（动物）对或窝作为组间比较的基本单位，而不是用胎仔或幼仔个体。应说明检验方法的合理性（注释 23）。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: When employing inferential statistics (determination of statistical significance) the mating pair or litter, not the foetus or neonate, should be used as the basic unit of comparison. The tests used should be justified (Note 23).

instruction:
已知信息：
'2万支（瓶）以下（含2万支），抽样1件；5万支（瓶）以下（含5万支），抽样2件；10万支（瓶）以下（含10万支），抽样3件；10万支（瓶）以上，每增加10万支（瓶）加抽1件，不足10万支（瓶）以10万支（瓶）计。'可被翻译为：If the quantity is below 20,000 vials (including), take 1 product for sampling; if the quantity is below 50,000 vials (including), take 2 products for sampling; if the quantity is below 100,000 vials (including), take 3 products for sampling; if the quantity is more than 100,000 vials, take additional 1 product for sampling for every additional 100,000 vials, and the odd less than 100,000 shall be counted as 100,000.
'每2万盒（瓶），抽样一件，不足2万盒（瓶）的按2万盒（瓶）计。'可被翻译为：Take 1 product for sampling for every 20,000 boxes (vials), and the odd less than 20,000 boxes (vials) shall be counted as 20,000.
'10件以内，抽样1件；11件－50件，每增加10件加抽1件，不足10件者以10件计；51件－100件，每增加20件加抽1件，不足20件者以20件计；101件以上，每增加50件加抽1件，不足50件者以50件计；1001件以上，每增加100件加抽1件，不足100件者以100件计；'可被翻译为：If the quantity is less than 10, take 1 product for sampling; if the quantity is 11 to 50, take additional 1 product for sampling for every additional 10, and the odd less than 10 shall be counted as 10; if the quantity is 51 to 100, take additional 1 product for sampling for every additional 20, and the odd less than 20 shall be counted as 20; if the quantity is more than 101, take additional 1 product for sampling for every additional 50, and the odd less than 50 shall be counted as 50; if the quantity is more than 1001, take additional 1 product for sampling for every additional 100, and the odd less than 100 shall be counted as 100;
'4．1公斤以下的，每20公斤抽样1件，不足20公斤者以20公斤计（原装抽样）。'可被翻译为：4. If the products within one package are less than 1 kg, take 1 product for sampling for every 20 kg, and the odd less than 20 kg shall be counted as 20 kg (taking samples from original package).

根据上述已知信息，请将'100－1000毫升（含1000毫升）的注射液，每1万瓶抽样1件，不足1万瓶的按1万瓶计。1000毫升以上的注射液（含透析液），每5000瓶（袋）抽样1件，不足5000瓶（袋）的按5000瓶计。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: If the injection is 100 ml to 1000 ml (including), take 1 product for sampling for every 10,000 vials, and the odd less than 10,000 vials shall be counted as 10,000. If the injection (including dialysate) is more than 1000 ml, take 1 product for sampling for every 5,000 vials (bags), and the odd less than 5,000 vials (bags)shall be counted as 5,000.

instruction:
已知信息：
'本指导原则是为CTD（ICH M4）模块3中所定义的制 剂在药品研发章节（3.2.P.2）中所申报内容提供指导。本原则不适用于指导药品研发中临床研究阶段的申报内容，但是其中的一些基本原则在该阶段也是非常值得考虑的。本原则也可能适用于其他类型的产品，申报者可以咨询相关管理机构来确定是否适用。'可被翻译为：This guideline is intended to provide guidance on the contents of Section 3.2.P.2 (Pharmaceutical Development) for drug products as defined in the scope of Module 3 of the Common Technical Document (ICH guideline M4). The guideline does not apply to contents of submissions for drug products during the clinical research stages of drug development. However, the principles in this guideline are important to consider during those stages as well. This guideline might also be appropriate for other types of products. To determine the applicability of this guideline to a particular type of product, applicants can consult with the appropriate regulatory authorities.
'药品研发信息应在CTD的P2章节中提交，而从药品研发过程得到的其它信息，则可以根据CTD的格式，以各种不同的方式提供（参见以下具体建议）。但是，申报者应清楚的标明各种信息在申报资料中所处的章节。除了在申报资料中已递交的内容外，本指导原则的部分内容（如产品生命周期管理，持续改进）涉及申报者的药品质量体系（见ICH Q10）。'可被翻译为：Pharmaceutical development information is submitted in Section P.2 of the CTD. Other information resulting from pharmaceutical development studies could be accommodated by the CTD format in a number of different ways and some specific suggestions are provided below. However, the applicant should clearly indicate where the different information is located. In addition to what is submitted in the application, certain aspects (e.g., product lifecycle management, continual improvement) of this guideline are handled under the applicant’s pharmaceutical quality system (see ICH Q10).
'为了促进CTD 通用指导原则(M4)的实施, ICH 专家组拟定了一系列问答: M4 问答'可被翻译为：In order to facilitate the implementation of the CTD General (M4) guideline, the ICH Experts have developed a series of Q&As: M4 Q&As
'在通用技术文件（CTD）中提交的药品研发及相信息'可被翻译为：SUBMISSION OF PHARMACEUTICAL DEVELOPMENT AND RELATED INFORMATION IN COMMON TECHNICAL DOCUMENTS (CTD) FORMAT

根据上述已知信息，请将'本指导原则介绍了在ICH M4通用技术文件（CTD）中药品研发章节（3.2.P.2）中应注册申报的内容。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: This guideline describes the suggested contents for the 3.2.P.2 (Pharmaceutical Development) section of a regulatory submission in the ICH M4 Common Technical Document (CTD) format.

output: The guideline focuses on treatment aimed to modify disease progression.

'在申请上市时，须递交 50 名儿童（0 至 12 岁）服药 50 天后的药动学参数（增量回收率、体内半衰期、药时曲线下面积和清除率）以及完整的疗效及安全性试验资料。'可被翻译为：Within the application for marketing authorisation, pharmacokinetic data (incremental recovery, in vivo  half-life, AUC and clearance) as well as the completed efficacy and safety trial in 50 children ( to 0 <12 y) followed for  EDs should be submitted.

output: PTPs of every age group could be included, provided that trial in children is completed (PK and efficacy and safety) and report is submitted and evaluated by the relevant Competent Authority(ies).

instruction:
已知信息：
'申请人获准开展药物临床试验的为药物临床试验申办者（以下简称申办者）。'可被翻译为：An applicant who is approved to carry out clinical trials of drugs shall be the sponsor of drug clinical trials (hereinafter referred to as the sponsor).
'1.54 申办者-研究者 单独或与其他人一起，发起并实施一个临床试验的个人。 在他(们)的直接指示下，给对象服用、发给对象或由对象使用 试验用药品。该术语并不包括除了个人以外的任何人(如不包括 一个公司和一个机构)。一个申办者-研究者的义务包括一个申 办者和一个研究者两者的义务。'可被翻译为：1.54 Sponsor-Investigator An individual who both initiates and conducts, alone or with others, a clinical trial, and under whose immediate direction the investigational product is administered to, dispensed to, or used by a subject. The term does not include any person other than an individual (e.g., it does not include a corporation or an agency). The obligations of a sponsor-investigator include both those of a sponsor and those of an investigator.
'1.53 申办者 发起一项临床试验的，并对该试验的管理和财务负责的个 人、公司、机构或组织。'可被翻译为：1.53 Sponsor An individual, company, institution, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical trial.
'17. 申办者 ICH E6（R1） 负责发起、管理和/或资助临床试验的个人、公司、机构或组织。'可被翻译为：17.Sponsor ICH E6 (R1) An individual, company, institution, or organisation which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical trial.

根据上述已知信息，请将'申办者，是指临床试验的发起、管理和提供财务支持的机构或者组织。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: The sponsor refers to the institution or organization that launches, manages and provides financial support for the clinical trial.

instruction:

'病毒清除工艺鉴定：用非特异“模型”病毒评价生产过程 去除和/或灭活病毒可靠性的研究。'可被翻译为：Viral clearance studies in which non-specific “model” viruses are used to assess the robustness of the manufacturing process to remove and/or inactivate viruses.

根据上述已知信息，请将'生产过程应该在公司的质量体系下被定期评估以核实溶剂的去除情况。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。

instruction:
已知信息：
'相比之 下，活性对照试验或剂量比较试验检测的是相对于其他治疗 的效果。'可被翻译为：In contrast, an active control trial or a dose-comparison trial measures the effect relative to another treatment.
'因此，假如在一项临床试验中 对它们进行比较，不同的终点选择和时间确定就可能对其中 某种治疗有利。'可被翻译为：Therefore, when comparing them in a clinical trial, the choice and timing of endpoints may favor one treatment or the other.
'8.4.作为可比性研究一部分的免疫原性可比性评价之方法学层面'可被翻译为：8.4. Methodological aspects to assess comparability of immunogenicity potential as part of a comparability exercise
'在可更加快捷地确立疗效的证据并使得在更早时间点与安慰剂进行比较变得可行的试验中，参照既定治疗选择评估疗效和安全性数据仍然很重要，尤其是在更晚的时间点，进行这些比较的精密度应作为试验样本量计划的一部分。'可被翻译为：For trials in which evidence of efficacy may be established more rapidly such that a comparison versus placebo at an earlier time- point is feasible, it remains important to contextualise efficacy and safety data against an established treatment option, in particular at later time periods, and the precision with which these comparisons can be made should be part of planning the sample size for the trial.

根据上述已知信息，请将'临床疗效的比较试验通常作为可比性工作的一部分。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: A comparative clinical efficacy trial will usually be required as part of the comparability exercise.

instruction:

'目前，尚无数据表明低于 10-4阀值的MRD水平会产生额外的临床利益。'可被翻译为：There is no data currently available to support a MRD level below the 10 -4 threshold would provide  added clinical benefit.
'可能必须通过其他项目来证明患者获得了有临床意义的获益，即使这些额外的项目平均 而言随时间的变化并不大。'可被翻译为：It may be that other items are necessary to demonstrate a clinically meaningful benefit for patients, even if those additional items on average do not change as much over time.
'目前的证据表明，在未选择的患者队列中，MRD水平≥10-4的患者的中位PFS大约2年，而MRD水平 <10-4的患者的预测中位PFS大约为6年。'可被翻译为：Current evidence suggests that in unselected patient cohorts an MRD level ≥ 10 -4is associated to a  median PFS of about 2 years, whereas a MRD level < 10 -4predicts a median PFS of around 6 years.
'目前的证据表明，MRD 水平≥10-2 的患者的中位PFS 大约 2 年，而 MRD 水平<10-4的患者的预测中位PFS 大约为 6 年。'可被翻译为：Current evidence suggests that an MRD level ≥ 10 -2 is associated to a median PFS of about 2 years, whereas a MRD level < 10 -4 predicts a median PFS of around 6 years.

根据上述已知信息，请将'目前，尚无前瞻性的数据表明MRD 低于 10-4 阀值会产生额外的临床利益。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: There is no prospective data currently available to support that a further reduction of MRD level below the 10 -4 threshold would provide added clinical benefit.

instruction:
已知信息：
'在研究产品的开发过程中，特别是在上市申请时，通常 会将不同试验的药物安全性与耐受性的特性进行汇总。'可被翻译为：The safety and tolerability properties of a drug are commonly summarised across trials continuously during an investigational product’s development and in particular at the time of a marketing application.
'为了揭示原料药内在稳定性而进行的研究，它是开发研究的一部分。'可被翻译为：Studies undertaken to elucidate the intrinsic stability of the drug substance.
'使用适当的工具来评估拟变更的影响，可以包括： o 对代表性物料（可以是中试规模或实验室规模，而不 是商业规模）进行的原料药和/或制剂的加速和/或影 响因素稳定性研究。 o 对代表性物料进行的变更前后的对比研究 o 相关数据的统计学评价，包括现有的稳定性研究 o 根据经验或一级动力学模型预测降解情况 o 利用先验知识，包括相关公司知识和科学文献'可被翻译为：Use of appropriate tools to evaluate the impact of the intended change. These may include: o Drug substance and/or drug product accelerated and/or stress studies on representative material (which may be pilot or laboratory scale rather than full scale) o Pre-and post-change comparability studies on representative material o Statistical evaluation of relevant data including existing stability studies o Predictive degradation and other empirical or first-principles kinetic models o Utilisation of prior knowledge including relevant company knowledge and the scientific literature
'拟定的验证批的数量应根据工艺变异性、工艺/产品的复杂性、 开发过程中获得的工艺知识、技术转移期间商业规模的支持性数据 以及MAH的整体经验确定。'可被翻译为：The number of proposed validation batches should be based on the variability of the process, the complexity of the process/product, process knowledge gained during development, supportive data at commercial scale during the technology transfer and the overall experience of the MAH.

根据上述已知信息，请将'通过药品或原料药上市后获得的知识和经验来确定此类型稳定性研究的规模和设计。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: The scope and design of such stability studies are informed by the knowledge and experience of the drug product and drug substance acquired since authorisation.

instruction:
已知信息：
'除非 靶点活性的表达仅见于这些罕见的情况，通常建议申办方平行或者在允许进行更全面评 估的适应症中确定了获益-风险时在这些小规模患者人群进行研究，特别是关于安全性的。'可被翻译为：Unless the target for activity is expressed only in these rare conditions, Sponsors are in general advised to undertake studies in these small patient groups in parallel to or when benefit – risk is established in indications allowing a more comprehensive evaluation, especially with respect to safety.
'一些可能的靶向适应症所包括的患者群体非常小，小到可能是“特殊情况”。'可被翻译为：Some possible target indications comprise very small groups of patients, so small that “exceptional circumstances” might apply.
'在某些情况下可能需要在ALS患者中开展I期研究，比如当在健康受试者中不表达目标机制时。'可被翻译为：In certain circumstances it may be appropriate to conduct phase I studies in ALS patients, such as when the target mechanism is not expressed in healthy subjects.
'申请人应根据药品的预期患者人群和拟定治疗适应症，考虑开展药物相互作用和/或特殊用药人群的研究。 如果申请人具有设计和开展这些研究方面的疑问，可咨询CDER审评小组 获取建议。'可被翻译为：Depending on the target patient population and the proposed therapeutic indication for the drug, you should consider conducting drug interactions and/or studies in specific populations. You should consult the appropriate CDER review division regarding the conduct and design of these studies if you have questions.

根据上述已知信息，请将'某些潜在目标适应症包括非常小组的患者，小到可以适用“例外情况”。除非在这些 少数情况下表现出目标活性，否则当在适应症确定获益-风险并允许开展与安全 有关的更为全面的评估时，一般建议申办者在这些患者小组中展开研究。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Some possible target indications comprise very small groups of patients, so small that “exceptional circumstances” might apply. Unless the target for activity is expressed only in these rare conditions, Sponsors are in general advised to undertake studies in these small patient groups in parallel to or when benefit – risk is established in indications allowing a more comprehensive evaluation, especially with respect to safety.

instruction:
已知信息：
'对于仅在显著超出（例如，超过50倍）人体暴露量时才发生的这些内分泌 活性，通常不需要进行附加的考察。'可被翻译为：Those endocrine activities that occur in animals only at exposures substantially above (e.g., greater than 50 times) the human exposure usually do not warrant additional investigation.
'如果上述机制信息和证据权重分析支持不具有相关的遗传毒性，仅需要单独一个具有合适暴露证据的体内试验，来确定受试物缺乏遗传毒性作用。'可被翻译为：If the above mechanistic information and weight of evidence supports the lack of relevant genotoxicity, only a single in vivo test with appropriate evidence of exposure is called for in order to establish the lack of genotoxic activity.
'与之相反，母体化合物随给药时间增加而 暴露量明显减少（如比起始暴露量减少≥50%），使得该试验不合适（除非可获得开始给药后较短几天内的血样）。'可被翻译为：In contrast, substantial reduction in exposure to parent drug with time (e.g., ≥ 50% reduction from initial exposure) can disqualify the study (unless a blood sample taken in the first few days is available).
'如果该试验确定了对生育力有 影响，则应确定受影响的性别。'可被翻译为：If effects on fertility are identified in the study, the affected sex should then be determined.

根据上述已知信息，请将'如果这种现象发生于单性别，通常在试验结束时不对暴露量减少的该性别进行评价，除非该性别中令人关注的代谢物的暴露量增加。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: If this is seen in one sex, generally the sex with reduced exposure would not be scored at the end of the study, unless there is enhanced exposure to a metabolite of interest.

instruction:
已知信息：
'到目前为止，只有有限的数据是可用的。'可被翻译为：So far limited data are available.
'铱、锇、铑、钌公开的安全性数据很少。'可被翻译为：There are very few published data on the safety of Iridium, Osmium, Rhodium and Ruthenium.
'19数据元素是与临床研究中一个项目有关的单次观察结果。'可被翻译为：19 Data element is a single observation associated with a subject in a clinical study.
'然而，关于这个新定义的人群的临床经验是相当有限的，有待在未来几年中实现。'可被翻译为：However, the clinical experience with this new defined group is fairly limited and will be achieved the coming years.

根据上述已知信息，请将'仅在有限的几 个项目提供了一些人类数据[4]。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Some human data are available but only in a limited number of subjects (ATSDR, 2003).

instruction:
已知信息：
'待包装产品变成成品所需的所有操作步骤，包括分装、贴签等。但无菌生产工艺中产品的无菌灌装，以及最终灭菌产品的灌装等不视为包装。'可被翻译为：All operations, including filling and labeling, which a bulk product has to undergo in order to become a finished product. Aseptic filling, filling of products for terminal sterilization, and etc., are not regarded as packaging.
'散装产品为成为成品而必须经历的所有操作，包括灌装和贴标。'可被翻译为：All operations, including filling and labelling, that a bulk product has to undergo in order to become a finished product.
'但无菌生产工艺中产品的无菌灌装，以及最终灭菌产品的灌装等不视为包装。'可被翻译为：Aseptic filling, filling of products for terminal sterilization, and etc., are not regarded as packaging.
'药品生产过程中涉及的所有操作，包括加工、配制、配方、灌装、包装和标签。'可被翻译为：All operations involved in the production of a drug, including processing, compounding, formulating, filling, packaging, and labelling.

根据上述已知信息，请将'1.散装产品为成为成品而必须经历的所有操作，包括灌装和贴标签。无菌灌装通常不被视为包装的一部分，散装产品是被灌装的，但不是最终包装的主要容器。
2.散装产品为成为成品而必须经历的所有操作，包括灌装和贴标签。在无菌条件下灌装无菌产品或打算最终灭菌的产品，通常不被视为包装的一部分。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output:
1.All operations, including filling and labelling, that a bulk product has to undergo in order to become a finished product. Sterile filling would not normally be regarded as part of packaging, the bulk product being the filled, but not the finally packaged, primary container.
2.All operations, including filling and labelling, that a bulk product has to undergo in order to become a finished product. Filling of a sterile product under aseptic conditions or a product intended to be terminally sterilized, would not normally be regarded as part of packaging.

instruction:
已知信息：
'预测性基因生物标记物可能是疗效（例如EGFR基因突变状态和使用易瑞沙）或者安全性的指标（例如HLA B* 5701阿巴卡韦过敏）。在一些特定的情况下这种区别可能会被混淆，并且数据也可能提供一些其他的解释。例如，帕尼单抗（维克替比）在晚期结直肠癌的三线治疗中的作用容易被解释为有效性标记物，而与FOLFOX化疗方案联用作为2线治疗表明，KRAS位点的突变可以作为安全性的一个标记物（KRAS突变的患者使用维克替比+FOLFOX方案可能会有潜在损害）。基因生物标记物也可能作为药物的分子靶点（Her-2受体和曲妥珠单抗）。因此在任何研发项目（包括所需的试验设计）中选择和评估基因生物标记物都应依据研究中的基因生物标记物预计的主要作用、疾病和标记物的复杂关系和药物的作用机制。例如，由 于Her-2受体的超表达是乳腺癌4的一个指标性结果，因此曲妥珠单抗（一种拮抗Her-2受体的单克隆抗体）5的研发就必然要求通过调整试验设计来评估这一效应。另外还要考虑到多种标记物会独立地或同时的与一种特定疾病相关联，由此影响到药物反应的预测效果（例如 乳腺癌6中的ER和Her-2受体、 Her-2和EGFR）。因此在探索性研究中可评估多个生物标记物（或基因生物标记物），并可按照实际情况、相关药物、作用的机制或途径，从中选择一个或多个标记物进行进一步评估。此种情况下每一个标记物和相关临床终点的关联强度将会影响其后续的研发、该生物标记物的临床应用情况[7]以及为临床和法规采用该基因生物标记物所要求的证据标准。在一项或多项探索性研究中研究一个基因生物标记物或一组基因生物标记物（多个标记物标记物/基因标记物）时，有必要认识到这类研究会产生假设，并且应包含一系列的分类标准8，可通过这些标准将一个或一组生物标记物转译成可预测临床转归的标记物。'可被翻译为：Predictive GBMs may be indicators of efficacy (e.g. EGFR mutation status and use of geftinib) or safety (e.g., HLA B* 5701 and abacavir hypersensitivity). This distinction may blur in certain situation and the data may provide opportunities for alternative interpretations. For example, the role of panitumumab (Vectibix) monotherapy in the third line indication in metastatic colorectal carcinoma is liable to interpretation as an efficacy marker while the combination with FOLFOX chemotherapy in the 2nd line indication suggests that mutant KRAS status may serve as a safety marker (potential for harm with the use of Vectibix + FOLFOX in those with mutated KRAS). GBMs may also serve as molecular targets for drug therapy (Her-2 receptor and trastuzumab). Therefore, the selection and evaluation of the GBM in any development programme (including design of the trials needed) will be dependent on the expected primary role of the GBM under consideration, the complexity of the relationship of the marker to the disease and, the mechanism of drug action. For example, while Her-2 receptor overexpression is an bindicator of outcome in breast cancer4, development of trastuzumab5, a monoclonal antibody against HER-2 necessarily required modification of the trial designs that permitted evaluation of this intervention. It is important to consider that more than one marker may be linked to a particular disease and also influence the predictability of drug response either independently or simultaneously (e.g. ER and Her-2 in breast cancer6, Her-2 and EGFR). Therefore, in exploratory studies, it is possible to evaluate a number of markers (or GBMs) among which one or more might eventually be selected for further evaluation depending on the situation, the drug in question and the mechanism or pathway of action. In such cases, the strength of association between each marker(s) and the relevant clinical endpoint will influence its subsequent development, clinical utility of the marker(s)7 and the evidentiary standards needed to achieve clinical and regulatory adoption of the GBM. When a GBM or a panel of GBMs (“multimarker signatures/ gene signatures”) are investigated within one or more exploratory studies, it is necessary to recognise that such studies are hypothesis generating and should include a set of classifiers8 that translate the biomarker or the panel into a set of markers that predict clinical outcome.
'基因生物标记物信号的产生可能基于理论合理性也可能基于初步研究中发现的关系，之后在基因生物标记物研发的探索阶段以经验方式加以确认。或者可在药物临床研发阶段期间、刚刚结束后或结束很长一段时间后提出假设。在某些情况下，潜在的生物标记物可能属于已 有的知识范畴（CYP450多态性或其他药物代谢酶），但在另一些情况下新的基因生物标记物可能在药物研发阶段或之外被研究（或产生）。经管需要的证据水平视情况而不同，但期望所有良好的临床和统计原则都能在这些情况中遵循。总的来说，早期信号生成研究的结果， 建议在前瞻性关键性临床研究中进行确认，对于有效性标记物而言更应如此。该前瞻性临床试验应能为标记物关系的机制、关治疗干预的相互作用标记物的预测价值及其临床使用提供详细的分析。少数情况下，可能在关键性临床试验期间完或成后通过III期试验的回顾性或 探索性分析来发现某一基因生物标记物，原因是关键性试验的大样本量更有助于明确定义受益或识别低发生率的药物不良反应，此种不良反应在探索性研究可能并不明显（例如帕尼单抗与KRAS的关系研究）。第二中情况更易发生于对安全性相关的基因生物标记物。安全性相关生物标记物（基因生物标记物）可能在药物上市后才可被发现，此时要求更新药品文献综述。此种更新有时被称为”翻新（retrofit）”,即一旦在上市后研究或观察中新增基因生物标记物的相关数据，则可在原有批准内容的基础上对产品文献综述和临床使用说明进行修改。这种补救措施并非最理想的策略。对阿巴卡韦的过敏症评估正是其中一例。更新时可能包含 回顾性分析，但并非强制要求。'可被翻译为：GBM signals may be generated based on theoretical plausibility or based on an association noted in preliminary studies, and then confirmed empirically during the exploratory phase of development of the GBM. Alternatively, hypotheses may be generated during, immediately after, or a long time after the clinical development programme for a medicinal product. In some instances, a candidate biomarker may fit in to an existing body of knowledge (CYP450 polymorphisms or other drug metabolising enzymes) but in other cases novel GBMs may be investigated (or generated) within or outside of a drug development programme. While the evidentiary burden will differ between circumstances, it is expected that sound clinical and statistical principles are followed in all of these situations. In general, confirmation of findings obtained from early signal generating studies in a prospective pivotal clinical trial is expected and this more likely to be the expectation for markers of efficacy. The prospective clinical trials should provide a detailed analysis of the basis of the association, the interaction with the relevant therapeutic intervention, the predictive value of the marker and then its clinical utility. Occasionally, a GBM may be identified during or after the pivotal trials are completed through a retrospective or an exploratory analysis of the phase III trial due to the fact that the larger sample size in the pivotal trials provide greater opportunity both for defining the benefit more clearly or for identifying the low frequency ADRs, not evident in the exploratory clinical studies (for example Panitumumab & KRAS). The second scenario is more frequently true for GBMs related to safety. Indeed, markers (GBMs) related to safety may be identified after the medicinal product has been marketed, necessitating updates to the product literature. This sometimes is referred to as “retrofit” i.e., the product literature and clinical use may be modified from the original authorisation, once data relating to the GBM become available from post marketing studies or observations. This type of rescue strategy is not optimal. Evaluation of hypersensitivity reactions to abacavir serves as the exemplar of such a situation. Retrofit does not invariably imply retrospective analysis but may include such evaluation.
'预测性基因生物标记物'可被翻译为：Predictive GBMs
'预后基因生物标记物（标记物）指与未治疗的或接受不同治疗的患者转归相关的标记物。研发和评估这类预后基因生物标记物通常采样一些便捷的患者或受试者样本（根据可用的生物样本情况）进行基因生物标记物（血样或组织）检测。因此预后生物标记物可能可以或不能为临床决策或者影响治疗或干预的决策流程提供依据。但研究评估预后基因生物标记物或可能提供自然病程的科学背景，也可能促进其他生物标记物（基因或非基因）的研发和间接 促进药物的研发。'可被翻译为：Prognostic GBMs (or markers) are those that correlate with outcome of disease in either untreated or heterogeneously treated patients. Development and evaluation of such GBMs are often based on a convenience sample of patients or subjects based on the availability of biological sample for assay of the GBM (blood or tissue). Thus prognostic BMs may or may not provide the basis for a clinical decision or influence the decision algorithm for treatment or intervention. However, studies evaluating prognostic GBMs may provide a scientific background of the natural history of the disease, facilitate development of additional other biomarkers (genomic or non-genomic) and contribute to drug development indirectly.

根据上述已知信息，请将'预测性基因生物标记物在药物研中是最为重要的领域，这些预测性基因生物标记物应当包括某些治疗前特征，以判定某一受试者是否适合接受这一受试药物。通常来说这些预测性基因生物标记物采用两分法或按特定的分类程序来分类（见3.2章）。需注意这些基因生物标记物最简单的形式可能是一个基因或一个点突变，或者可能基于许多基因的表达水平，其表达模式以一种既定的方式进行结合和评估。如果这些不同的基因或者表达水平的关系不是预先确定，而是按照一项试验中的受试者工作特征来确定相关临界值的，则需要另外一项试验来确认这种关系。通过在一些根据标记物选择和分组的明确患者人群中进行关键性临床试验有助于对这类预测性标记物的临床使用情况进行评估。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: For the purposes of drug development, predictive GBMs occupy the highest area of interest. These should be pre-treatment characteristics that enable to determine whether a particular subject is a good candidate for treatment with a test agent. Commonly these tend to be binary or depend on classifiers (see section 3.2). Of note, these GBMs, in their simplest form could be a gene or point mutation. Alternatively, they could be based on expression levels of many genes where expression profiles of these genes are combined and evaluated in a predefined fashion. If the relationship between different genes or their expression levels are not predefined, but cut off points are generated using ROCs from one trial, then confirmation in a second trial would be expected. Evaluation of clinical utility of such predictive markers is facilitated by pivotal trials conducted in defined patient populations, selected and grouped based on the marker(s).

instruction:
已知信息：
'已经报告了用药错误，当以毫克标记口服给药装置但是剂量以毫升计时，导致患者不能测量特定体积的口服溶液。'可被翻译为：Medication dosing errors have been reported when an oral dosing device is labeled in milligrams but the dose is prescribed in milliliters, leading to patients being unable to measure a specific volume of oral solution.
'检查药品规格和剂量的一致性。曾因开发的药品规格或表达的药品规格，与药品的剂量和用法用量不一致，使用剂量计算变得复杂化，而导致剂量错误。例如，说明书中药品规格按百分比表示，但药品的剂量和用法用量是按毫克来描述。这类问题的另一个例子为，一个药品的常用剂量是300mg，但只有每瓶100ml的包装。如果每次服用全部剂量需要3瓶，而不是1瓶时，则很容易发生剂量和用法用量的错误。服用多个单位（如，片、胶囊、瓶、注射器）才达到全部剂量，已经导致剂量错误，因为用药者可以计算错误或每次忘记服用了几个单位的药物。'可被翻译为：Check for consistency between the drug product strength and dosing. Developing a product strength or expressing the strength in a manner that is incongruent with the dosage and administration of the product complicates the calculation of dosage and has led to dosing errors. For example, the strength may be expressed on the label in percentage, but the dosage and administration of the drug is described in milligrams. Another example of this type of problem would include a product with a usual dosage of 300 mg when the product is only available as a 100 mg vial. If 3 vials are needed to make up the full dose rather than a single vial, the product may be prone to dosing and administration errors. Multiple units (e.g., tablets, capsules, vials, syringes) required to achieve a usual single dose have led to dosing errors because of users making miscalculations or forgetting how many units have already been administered.
'7. 公制计量 计量或规格的表述应该使用公制计量单位如毫升，毫克和微克，而不是药剂师 或家用的计量单位（例如，茶匙、汤匙、打兰和格令）或比例（例如，1： 1000）。'可被翻译为：7.Metric Measurements The dose or expression of strength should appear in metric units of measure such as mL, mg, and mcg, rather than apothecary or household measurements (e.g., tsp for teaspoon, TBSP for tablespoon, drams, and grains) or ratios (e.g., 1:1000).
'E.避免使用外形相似的容器标签和纸盒标识 。 外观相似的容器标签和纸盒标识经常导致药品选择错误，从而又导致分发和配 给了错误的药品，错误的规格和/或错误的剂量。'可被翻译为：E. Avoid Look-alike Container Labels and Carton Labeling  Look-alike container labels and carton labeling have frequently contributed to product selection  errors leading to the dispensing and administration of the wrong drug, wrong strength and/or  wrong dose.

根据上述已知信息，请将'如果产品的规格在容器标签 上显示地不清楚，或表述用的计量单位与计量说明上所使用的计量单位不一致，就 有可能会导致选择和配给错误的剂量（即，用药过量或用药不足）。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: If the product strength is not clearly displayed on the container label, or is expressed in units of measure that are incongruent with those used in the dosing instructions, the wrong strength can be selected or the wrong dose administered (i.e., over- or under-dosing).

instruction:
已知信息：
'如果研究仅仅中枢神经性疼痛或仅仅周围神经性疼痛的模型，通常会相应地限制适应症。合适的中枢神经病模型包括脊髓损伤和中风后疼痛。'可被翻译为：If models of just central neuropathic pain or of just peripheral neuropathic pain are studied, 569 the indication will normally be restricted accordingly. Suitable central neuropathic models include spinal cord injury and post-stroke pain.
'中枢机制可能参与外周和中枢神经性疼痛，但外周机制通常不参与中枢神经性疼痛。'可被翻译为：Central mechanisms may be involved in both peripheral and central neuropathic pain, but peripheral mechanisms are not generally involved in central neuropathic pain.
'应尽可能表征神经性疼痛的外周或中枢起源以及相关的阴性和阳性现象（感觉发现）。'可被翻译为：The peripheral or central origin of neuropathic pain should be characterised as far as 620 possible as well as associated negative and positive phenomena (sensory findings).
'为了证明治疗神经性疼痛的一般适应症是合理的，需要单独证明在中枢和周围神经性疼痛中的有效性。'可被翻译为：To justify a general indication for the treatment of neuropathic pain, efficacy needs to be demonstrated independently in models of both central and peripheral neuropathic pain.

根据上述已知信息，请将'中枢神经性疼痛的示例是中风后或脊髓损伤神经性疼痛，而糖尿病痛性周围神经病变 （DPNP）或带状疱疹后神经痛（PHN）是常见的外周神经性疼痛病症。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Examples of central neuropathic pain are post-stroke or spinal cord injury neuropathic pain, while diabetic peripheral neuropathy (DPNP) or post-herpetic neuralgia (PHN) are common peripheral neuropathic pain conditions.

instruction:
已知信息：
'方案及后续修 订应获得包括试验统计师在内的责任人员的批准。'可被翻译为：The protocol and subsequent amendments should be approved by the responsible personnel, including the trial statistician.
'试验统计 师（见词汇表）在与其他临床试验专家合作时，其作用和职 责是确保在支持药物研发的临床试验中恰当地应用统计学 原则。'可被翻译为：The role and responsibility of the trial statistician (see Glossary), in collaboration with other clinical trial professionals, is to ensure that statistical principles are applied appropriately in clinical trials supporting drug development.
'一项研究的 综合性完整报告不应是临床报告和统计报告的简单合并。'可被翻译为：The integrated full report of a study should not be derived by simply joining a separate clinical and statistical report.
'试验统计师'可被翻译为：trial statistician

根据上述已知信息，请将'为此，试验统计师应是负责临床研究报告的小组成 员之一，还应批准临床报告。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: To this end the trial statistician should be a member of the team responsible for the clinical study report, and should approve the clinical report.

instruction:
已知信息：
'Zoboryn是ZB3579临床试验的唯一申办者。'可被翻译为：Zoboryn is the sole sponsor of ZB3579 clinical trials.
'每批药品均应当编制唯一的批号。'可被翻译为：Each batch of product should have a unique batch number.
'试验编号（例如：方案编号或其他试验识别码）；'可被翻译为：Study ID (e.g., protocol number or other identifier);
'申请人获准开展药物临床试验的为药物临床试验申办者（以下简称申办者）。'可被翻译为：An applicant who is approved to carry out clinical trials of drugs shall be the sponsor of drug clinical trials (hereinafter referred to as the sponsor).

根据上述已知信息，请将'11 EudraCT编号是欧洲经济区内获准的临床试验的唯一识别码。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 11 The EudraCT number is the unique identifier for trials authorised in the European Economic Area.

instruction:
已知信息：
'如章节IV中所讨论的，FDA建议潜在ANDA申请者按照基于层次的方法，它可以有效地对比T产品与R产品之间的防止滥用的措施。'可被翻译为：As discussed in Section IV, FDA recommends that potential ANDA applicants follow a tier-based approach to efficiently compare the abuse deterrence of T product to R product.
'FDA建议潜在ANDA申请者遵循基于层次的方法，它可以 有效地对比T产品及其R产品，并限制评估T产品的防止滥用的措施所需的检验 数量。'可被翻译为：FDA recommends that potential ANDA applicants follow a tier-based approach to efficiently compare a T product to its R product and limit the number of tests required for evaluating the abuse deterrence of T product.
'如果可用的体外检测方法过度敏感或者不能充分地评估和 对比T产品与R产品的防止滥用的措施，潜在ANDA申请者还可以提议进行PK研究。'可被翻译为：Potential ANDA applicants may also propose to conduct PK studies in cases where available in vitro testing methodology is overly sensitive or cannot adequately assess the abuse deterrence of the T product relative to the R product.
'对T产品的防止滥用的措施评估应基于潜在 申请者对R产品的防止滥用的措施、可能的滥用途径、以及对通过这些途径滥用 的评估有意义的特定措施的最大理解。'可被翻译为：The evaluation of the abuse deterrence of T product should be based on the potential applicant’s best understanding of the abuse deterrence of R product, the potential routes of abuse, and specific measures meaningful to the evaluation of abuse by those routes.

根据上述已知信息，请将'为了充分地对比R产品与T产品，潜在ANDA申请者应采用在本指南描述的基于层次的方法，鉴定R产品在所 有滥用途径方面的防止滥用的措施。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: In order to adequately compare R and T products, a potential ANDA applicant should identify the R product’s abuse deterrence for all routes of abuse using the tier-based approach described in this guidance.

instruction:
已知信息：
'肿瘤预防 法规经验是有限的，但是在概念上情形与辅助治疗是相当类似的。'可被翻译为：Tumour Prevention Regulatory experience is limited, but conceptually the situation is rather similar to the adjuvant setting.
'对照治疗方案应根据主要抗癌指南中列出的标准来选择。'可被翻译为：The control regimen should be selected according to the criteria set out in the main anticancer guideline.
'方案应该定义出用于排除远端转移的方法。直肠指检仍然被认为是最适合评估局部进展的方法。如果研究无法在双盲情况下进行，建议由两个独立的泌尿科医生进行检查。其它疗效标准与下文描述的远端转移瘤的标准类似。'可被翻译为：The protocol should define methods to be used to exclude distant metastases. Digital rectal examination is still considered the most appropriate method to assess local progression. If studies cannot be conducted under proper double blind conditions, examination by two independent urologists is recommended. Response criteria are otherwise similar to those for metastatic disease presented below.
'远端转移瘤的治疗'可被翻译为：Therapy for metastatic disease

根据上述已知信息，请将'其它疗效标准与下文描述的远端转移瘤的标准类似。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: Response criteria are otherwise similar to those for metastatic disease presented below.

instruction:
已知信息：
'部分缓解（即未达到完全缓解，但是肾脏缓解程度能维持eGFR处于相对于基线值的预定边界内）'可被翻译为：A partial response, i.e. not full recovery but renal response able to maintain an eGFR within pre- specified margins with respect to baseline values,
'主要终点应该是LDA（最低限度）或者病情缓解。'可被翻译为：The primary endpoint should be LDA, at a minimum, or remission.
'部分缓解，其定义为GFR出现有临床意义的改善或稳定，但没有完全恢复到正常水平或基线值。'可被翻译为：Partial response, defined as a clinically meaningful improvement or stabilisation of GFR without full recovery to normal or baseline values.
'b） 主要/完全肾脏缓解的维持和肾脏疾病发作的预防（依据发生比例和严重程度的下降，说明肾脏疾病发作的类型[肾脏和/或尿蛋白的类型均应说明]并根据对应的基线情况进行分类）。'可被翻译为：b) Maintenance of major/complete renal response and prevention of renal flares [in terms of both decreased incidence proportions and their severity grades, specifying the type of renal flares (both nephritic and/or proteinuric ones) and classified correspondingly to the baseline conditions]

根据上述已知信息，请将'预期主要终点应参考主要/完全肾脏缓解的有临床意义的数值，如GFR恢复正常或恢复到基线水平，或 24 小时尿蛋白低于 0.5 g。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: It is expected that primary endpoints should be contextualised by reference to clinically meaningful values for major/complete response, such as normalisation/return to baseline of measured GFR or proteinuria of <0.5 g/24-h.

instruction:
已知信息：
'研究设计在某种程度上依赖于所评价的结果。'可被翻译为：The study design is to some extent dependent on the outcome being evaluated.
'多地区研究还具有其他用途。'可被翻译为：There are other possible uses of multi-regional studies.
'以多地区临床试验来作为特定地区的桥接研究，需要获得该地区有说服力的研究结果。这是因为该地区研究结果可以使该地区监管者确认药物的有效性，且可以“桥接”注册申报中其他地 区的研究结果。'可被翻译为：For a multi-regional trial to serve as a bridging study for a particular region, it would need to have persuasive results in that region, because it is these regional results that can convince the regulators in that region that the drug is effective, and can "bridge" the results of trials in other regions in the registration application.
'对于一个预期可以作为桥接研究的试验，应考虑以下几点： 计划多地区试验需满足申报地区在研究设计和分析方面的监管要求（见Q1 答复）。'可被翻译为：For a study intended to serve as a bridging study, the following points should be considered: Planning The multi-regional trial would have to satisfy requirements of the region where the application is to be filed with respect to design and analysis (see answer to Q1).

根据上述已知信息，请将'一项研究的结果通常用于多个地区的监管 申请，设计还应考虑研究结果与进行研究地区以外地区的相 关性。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: The results of a study are often used in regulatory submissions in multiple regions, and the design should also consider the relevance of the study results for regions other than the one(s) in which the study is conducted.

instruction:
已知信息：
'对于社区代表的 “代表性”如何，以及如何解读参与该项研究的不同社区的意见，尤其是在 它们不同时，和如何进行适当的回应，都不可避免的存在疑问。'可被翻译为：There are inevitably questions of how “representative” community representatives are, and how to interpret the views of the various communities involved in the research, particularly if they differ, and what constitutes an appropriate response.
'不同的IRB可能认为需要开展更多或更少的社区咨询，取决于特定研究和社区的独特环境。'可被翻译为：Different IRBs may consider more or less community consultation necessary, depending on the unique circumstances of a particular study and the community.
'采用不同的社区咨询活动将扩大社区参与的机会。'可被翻译为：Using a variety of community consultation activities will broaden the opportunity for community involvement.
'在开展社区咨询活动时，申办方和临床研究者应确保参与该项研究的社区代表具有参与该咨询过程的机会。'可被翻译为：In conducting community consultation activities, sponsors and clinical investigators should ensure that representatives from the community(ies) involved in the research have an opportunity to participate in the consultation process.

根据上述已知信息，请将'参与社区咨询活动的代表的类型和数量可以因研 究而不同，甚至同一项研究不同中心也可以不同。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: The types and number of representatives who participate in community consultation activities may vary by study or even across sites within the same study.

instruction:
已知信息：
'生存率 应尽量明确研究中发生的心源性死亡的具体模式（如心源性猝死、泵功能衰竭、急性冠状动脉事件）。'可被翻译为：Survival  Efforts should be made to define the specific mode of cardiac death occurring in the studies (e.g. sudden cardiac death, pump failure, acute coronary events).
'应集中数据，从而能够评估死亡率下降的临床诱因（如心律失常、中风、心肌梗塞、非心血管性等）。'可被翻译为：Data should be gathered so as to enable evaluation of the clinical causes of reduction in mortality (such as arrhythmias, stroke, myocardial infarction, non-cardiovascular, etc.).
'心血管死亡：急性心肌梗死造成的死亡、心源性猝死，心脏衰竭导致的死亡、卒 中死亡和其他心血管疾病导致的死亡。'可被翻译为：Cardiovascular death: death resulting from an acute myocardial infarction, sudden cardiac death, death due to heart failure, death due to stroke, and death due to other cardiovascular causes.
'血管性死亡应该包括血栓栓塞事件(PE、中风)导致的死亡、所有心血管原因死亡(例如:由于心肌梗塞、心力衰竭或心律失常)和出血引起的死亡。'可被翻译为：Vascular deaths should include deaths caused by thromboembolic events (PE, stroke), all cardiac deaths (e.g.: due to myocardial infarction, heart failure or arrhythmia) and bleeding.

根据上述已知信息，请将'评估死亡率的时候应把猝死（或有证明的心律失常导致的死亡）包括在内，这是非常重要的，'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: It is important to include sudden death (or death due to arrhythmia when documented) in evaluating mortality.

instruction:
已知信息：
'定义为至少出现一次严重出血和/或临床相关非严重出血的患者比例。'可被翻译为：defined as the rate of patients experiencing at least one major bleeding and/or a clinically relevant non-major bleeding.
'- 临床相关出血：定义为至少出现一次严重出血和/或临床相关非严重出血的患者比例。'可被翻译为：- Clinically relevant bleeding: defined as the rate of patients experiencing at least one major bleeding and/or a clinically relevant non-major bleeding.
'- 非严重出血：定义为至少出现一次临床相关非严重出血或其他非严重出血的患者比例。'可被翻译为：- Non-major bleeding: defined as the rate of patients experiencing at least one clinically relevant non-major bleeding or other non-major bleeding.
'- 总出血：定义为至少出现一次严重出血、临床相关非严重出血或其他非 严重出血的患者比例。'可被翻译为：- Total bleeding: defined as the rate of patients experiencing at least one major bleeding, clinically relevant non-major bleeding or other non-major bleeding.

根据上述已知信息，请将'定义为至少出现一次严重出血、临床相关非严重出血或其他非严重出血的患者比例。'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: defined as the rate of patients experiencing at least one major bleeding, clinically relevant non-major bleeding or other non-major bleeding.

instruction:
已知信息：
'1.拭子处理必须在 HEPA 过滤 II 级生物安全柜（BSC）或 HEPA 过滤层流罩（LFH）内无菌操作，其中的空气级别应该等于或优于擦拭取样点。'可被翻译为：1. All processing of swabs must be aseptically performed within a HEPA Filtered II Biological Safety Cabinet (BSC) or HEPA Filtered Laminar Flow Hood (LFH) with an air classification at the same rating or better than that from which the swab was collected
'用合适的消毒剂擦拭所有外部取样容器，然后放入 LFH/BSC'可被翻译为：Wipe down all outer sampling containers with a suitable sanitizing agent before placement in the LFH/BSC
'1.用适合的消毒剂对套好手套的手消毒（即，杀孢子剂或 70%无菌乙醇）'可被翻译为：1. Disinfect gloved hands with a suitable sanitizing agent (i.e. sporicidal agent or sterile 70% alcohol).
'无菌 70%乙醇（ETOH）或异丙醇（IPA）'可被翻译为：Sterile 70% ethanol (ETOH) or Isopropyl Alcohol (IPA)

根据上述已知信息，请将'2.将拭子放进层流罩开始分析之前，BSC 或 LFH 的所有表面必须用杀孢子剂和过滤器无菌 70%乙醇或 IPA 彻底消毒'翻译为英文，只能输出翻译后的句子，不允许添加编造成分。
output: 2. All surfaces within the BSC or LFH must be thoroughly disinfected with a sporicidal disinfectant followed by filter sterile 70% ethanol or IPA prior to placing swabs under the hood and beginning analysis.

instruction:
已知信息：
'本节对药物警戒计划的结构提供指导意见。'可被翻译为：This section gives guidance on the structure of a Pharmacovigilance Plan.
'药物警戒计划；'可被翻译为：• Pharmacovigilance Plan;
